column5: Welcome to the chilliest apartment on airbnb haha (literally 5 days ago so fairly new haha) getting new stuff from Ikea very soon. Has a air mattress, fast wifi , etc the essentials. Basically a place for someone that just needs a clean , loving place and a roof over your head. I love anime, fashion, & photography and don't care what you do as long as your respectful. If your hungry I'm always down to order food of your choosing (: hope you enjoy your stay!
